Book Description
Publication Date: May 7, 2014
A sugar baby in love. A doctor with a heartbreaking secret. And a love neither of them ever expected to find.

Lucy McPherson struggled all of her adult life to take care of her daughter and later, her mother. At the age of twenty-eight, she became a Ã¢â‚¬ËœcompanionÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ to Bradley Blackwell, seeing him one weekend a month and being compensated handsomely enough to ease her worries.

Two years in, Lucy realizes sheÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s broken rule #1 and fallen in love.

Afraid of losing him, Lucy keeps her feelings private, only for Bradley to begin acting strangely and breaking the rules himself.

When she finds out the past that Bradley has kept hidden from her and the world, she begins questioning their whole relationship.

The revelations leave her wondering if she is truly the one with the most to loseÃ¢â‚¬Â¦or if he is.

More About the Author

Biography
C.S. Janey is a big fan of romance -- writing and reading.

The mother of one, she currently spends her days writing, reading, procrastinating, and protecting her son from himself as he pretends that he is a superhero.

Sugar Baby Lies is her third novel and a complete standalone.

Her first novel, Surrender To You, is the first in a series, but may be read as a standalone. The story is a contemporary adult romance with characters in their late 20s, early 30s. The other books in the series will involve secondary characters introduced in the first.

Love Renewed is her second contemporary adult romance. The first in her Love Trilogy, it can be enjoyed as a standalone novella. The other two books in the series, Love Desired (#2), featuring Ramsey and Arabella, and Love Hidden (#3), featuring Gwyneth and Lucien, will soon follow.

You can find all her novels, present and hopefully in the future, on Amazon, B&N, Kobo, All Romance eBooks, iBooks and Smashwords, as well as those they distribute to -- if applicable.
